tiles.alt: Just Drink
Everybody Drinks
All the single people drink
Anyone in a couple drinks
Drink for every year  you have knowned the person tagged below
Blondes drink
Brunettes drink
Gingers drink
Black-haired people drink
Anyone who is not straight, drink!
Anyone with a one syllable name, drink
EVERYONE: Make an animal noise then drink
Anyone who has ever dyed their hair, drink
TRUTH OR DARE
Anyone who claims they are not drunk must drink
Drink for however many countries you've been to
You can't speak your native language for an entire round
Pick a word that is banned for one round. Anyone who says it must drink.
Anyone who wears glasses must drink
Pick a word that everyone must end their sentences with for one round. Anyone who forgets must drink.
Tell a joke. If nobody laughs then drink
Anyone who has eaten during the game, drink!
DECISION DRINKS: Who would you rather make out with?
DECISION DRINKS: Who would win in a fight?
DECISION DRINKS: Who is most likely to end up alone?
DECISION DRINKS: Who is most likely to have their partner cheat on them?
CATEGORIES: Pick a category and go around naming items. Drink if you can't think of one or repeat.
Everyone ignore this player for one round
TRUTH OR LIE: Make a statement about yourself that's either true or false. Other players decide if it's true or not. If they are correct, you drink, if not, then they drink.
The last person who drank must drink again!
Choose someone to drink!
RAP GOD: Perform a freestyle rap or drink three times
Give out five sips to anyone who deserves an extra drink!
BABY TALK: Talk like a baby for the next round. Drink everytime you don't
POP STAR: Sing everything you say for the next round. Drink if you don't
WATERFALL: Everyone must start drinking with you and can't stop until you do
Anyone who has made out with someone in a club, drink!
Anyone who has forgotten a night out, drink
Anyone with a cartoon avatar must drink!
Drink with the player you have known the longest
Anyone who has thrown up from being drunk, drink
Anyone who has cheated or been cheated on, drink
QUESTION MASTER: If anyone answers your questions for the next round, they drink
ACCENT: Talk in a foreign accent for the next round. Drink if you break character.
YOU ARE THE BULLY: Only speak in insults for the next round. Drink if you don't
YOU ARE THE BROWN-NOSE: Only speak in compliments for the next round. Drink if you don't
SHUT UP! You cannot speak for the next round. If you speak, drink
THE FOOL: You cannot answer questions for the next round. If you do, drink
THE KING'S SPEECH: Give an inspirational speech. If people don't like it, drink
RULE MAKER: Make a rule for the rest of the game. If anyone breaks it, they drink.
Play a round of 'Never Have I Ever'. Losers drink
Give a compliment to the person tagged below and take a drink together
TED TALK: Give a talk for 1 minute on a topic given to you by the player tagged below. If you fail, take 5 drinks.
Anyone who has a profile on a dating app, drink
Anyone who is currently in their bedroom, drink
BANANA SPLIT: Divide out 10 drinks to the people of your choosing.
Take 5 drinks
SNOWBALL: Take a drink. Each person then takes one more drink than the person before them until it returns back to you.
Drink if you have a cat
Drink if you have a dog
PROPOSAL: Pretend to propose to the person tagged below or take 5 drinks
Drink if you have taken a picture during this game
Drink if you have spilled your drink tonight
Take a drink without using your hands
Drink for however many siblings you have
Drink if you were born in the winter
Drink if you were born in the autumn
Drink if you were born in the summer
Drink if you were born in the spring
Drink as many times as there are players in the game
SOCIAL POST: The person tagged below must choose something for you to post to your social media. If you don't, drink 5.
Smokers, drink
Vapers, drink
Read out your last text or take 3 drinks
DECISION DRINKS: Who is most likely to die first?
